notes.text: SmartField: reaction to signature change of updateBindingContext"
Enable design time for Smart Controls
FilterBar: added event 'assignedFiltersChanged'
FilterBar: configure visibility of Filters button
FilterBar: enhanced add/remove filters in dialogs
FilterBar: new design
FilterBar: new event 'initialized'.
FilterBar: support for sap_belize theme
FilterBar: support the display of a header
SmartChart: adding segmented buttons
SmartChart: enable multiple semantic navigation
SmartChart: new "Details" section and Breadcrumbs navigation.
SmartControls: TextArrangement annotation now supported
SmartControls: support for Edm.Time filtering and TimePicker
SmartField - ARIA label support
SmartField: Integrate ObjectStatus
SmartField: Integrate TimePicker Control
SmartField: Property preventInitialDataFetchInValueHelpDialog added to configuration
SmartField: Support Icon for Criticality
SmartField: inner SmartLink uses text annotation
SmartField: press event to handle press of sap.m.Link and titlePress of sap.m.ObjectIdentifier
SmartField: sap:creatable Annotation
SmartFilter: enable multi-value copy/paste for string fields
SmartFilter: set error on control when validation fails
SmartFilter: support retrieval of specific model Filter(s)
SmartForm - Enhance layout to be able to influence number of group elements per line
SmartForm/Group - Hide group when all group elements hidden
SmartForm: Focus can now be set to the first editable control
SmartForm: Layout enhanced to disable automatic single column display
SmartForm: New method propagateGridDataSpan to propagate span to group elements
SmartTable: Edm.Time data type now uses TimePicker control in edit mode
SmartTable: create ObjectIdentifier, ObjectStatus and Image
SmartTable: full-screen mode implemented
SmartTable: new fieldChange event for change notifications
SmartTable: support SortOrder from PresenationVariant
SmartVariantManagement : propagate manage event
SmartVariantManagement: enable the storage of the standard variant for template based application
SmartVariantManagement: support of page variants
Variants: applied restriction for variant name length
sap.ui.comp.SmartAreaMicroChart: Associated controls for Title and Description added
sap.ui.comp.SmartBulletMicroChart: associated Controls for Title and Description are added
sap.ui.comp.smartchart.SmartChart: New control implemented
sap.ui.comp.smartfield.SmartField: Provide function getAccessibilityInfo
sap.ui.comp.smartform.Layout: New properties breakpointXL, columnsXL, emptySpanXL, labelSpanXL
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartBulletMicroChart: UnitOfMeasure association added
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartMicroChart: UnitOfMeasure association added
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartMicroChart: introduce new control SmartMicroChart
sap.viz - Fiori wave11 features
SmartTable: create Link for DataFieldWithUrl LineItem fields
FilterBar: Filters dialog  gets corrupted
FilterBar: apply variant only when initialize is completed
FilterBar: consider expanded state when applying advanced mode
FilterBar: correction for _determineGroupNameByname
FilterBar: correction for basic search is set before persKey
FilterBar: correction for filterbar expanded state
FilterBar: do not apply when setDataSuite is called
FilterBar: during initial apply do not trigger filterChange events
FilterBar: execute applyVariant when called via setDataSuiteFormat
FilterBar: fix potential infinit loop during setDataSuiteFormat
FilterBar: for corrupted filters dialog display
FilterBar: ignore filters which are not part of current variant
FilterBar: make sure filter is loaded for determineControlByName
FilterBar: only non-visible filters exists
FilterBar: typpo in _determineGroupName
FilterBar: ya adjustment for 'Add to Filter Bar' label
GroupElement - LayoutData is now restored when layout is updated
GroupElement: Label is now updated/deleted when elements are inserted or removed
GroupElement: Label of GroupElement will no longer be overruled
GroupElement: propagate editable change to smart label
Small improvement of SmartField Explored App example
SmartChart&SmartTable: correction for the cancel event handling
SmartChart: adding detach from filter bar
SmartChart: change baseSize to 'auto'
SmartChart: consider also only one semantic object
SmartChart: correction for always select fields
SmartChart: select correct chart type, when comming from perso
SmartControls: navigationProperty and type handling corrected
SmartField - Enhance alignment for measures
SmartField-Demo-Kit: Correction of Mock Metadata
SmartField: ARIA label now also set for unit of measure fields
SmartField: Change of entity type is now handled correctly
SmartField: Check whether updating an entity set is enabled corrected
SmartField: Correct precision and scale is now applied to ObjectStatus control for UOM
SmartField: Description for empty key is now displayed
SmartField: Do not set maxFractionDigits for CurrencyType
SmartField: Height of SmartField control inside table cell will now be aligned with other controls
SmartField: Icon for ObjectStatus will no longer be displayed if criticality is undefined
SmartField: Locale settings are now applied when displaying a unit of measure
SmartField: Message Handling
SmartField: Non-editable Unit-of-Measure
SmartField: ObjectIdentifier margin will now be set inside table cell
SmartField: Properties showSuggestion and showValueHelp now handled
SmartField: Side Effect Handling
SmartField: Use setContextEditable instead of setEditable in Demokit
SmartField: Width for multi-line-text can now be set
SmartField: added currency constraints for precision and scale
SmartField: ariaLabelledBy is now propagated to inner controls
SmartField: check for Constraint existence
SmartField: consider destroy state
SmartField: consider wrapping in case of table context
SmartField: correction for formatDisplay for SmartLink
SmartField: correction for handling of empty string for currency
SmartField: do not trigger rerender, when a value was set
SmartField: do not wrap for dates and UoMs
SmartField: maxIntegerDigits now set correctly for currency type
SmartField: prevent creation of editable controls in ro tables
SmartField: provide min-width for UoM
SmartField: reaction to signature change of updateBindingContext
SmartField: reaction to signature change of updateBindingContext
SmartField: sap:value-list annotation for unit properties is now considered
SmartField: set forceSelection to false when rendering Select-ctrl
SmartField: use valueFormat for TimePicker
SmartFilter: FieldGroup related handling for navigationProperty
SmartFilter: GroupConfiguration/Label is correctly used again
SmartFilter: consider single date in DateRangeSelection
SmartFilter: correct validation behaviour for MultiInput fields
SmartFilter: validation of Date fields is now always enabled
SmartFilterBar: do not trigger filterChange through setFilterData when only _CUSTOM data is set
SmartForm - GroupElement with bound label for non smart field controls
SmartForm - Multiple elements per GroupElement now displayed correctly in horizontal layout
SmartForm/Group: Group label now uses stable IDs
SmartForm: Custom toolbar is now correctly displayed when used without panel
SmartForm: Editable will be set to inserted group elements
SmartForm: Empty group element label is no longer overwritten by label given in OData metadata
SmartForm: Empty label for GroupElement will no longer be rendered
SmartForm: Focus now set correctly for SmartField controls
SmartForm: Groups containing SmartFields with validation errors will now be automatically expanded if a check is performed
SmartForm: Horizontal layout rendering issue fixed
SmartForm: SmartForm now uses OverflowToolbar instead of Toolbar for the toolbar
SmartForm: Title control is now used for SmartForm title
SmartForm: Title for group will now only be created when group label is set
SmartLabel: addAriaLabeledBy to the smart field inner controls
SmartLabel: consider @i18n model notation
SmartLabel: react only once to metadata
SmartLink: copy wrapping to the callback control (in SmartTable)
SmartTable: Table Header shows wrong number of records
SmartTable: calculate filter path correctly for responsive table
SmartTable: cleanup unbound ResponsiveTable template on exit
SmartTable: consider scenarios where data is already loaded
SmartTable: fallback width handling for boolean/other types
SmartTable: force re-bind if path differs from previous binding
SmartTable: requestAtLeast annotation for non analytical tables
SmartTable: use a larger (3em) minimun column width
SmartVariantManagement: fire initialise event event in error state
SmartVariantManagement: fixed default variant, when app variant
VariantConvertTo: _CUSTOM may be of type string
VariantConverterFrom: consider conditiontype filters
VariantManagement : disable duplicate names in manage dialog
VariantManagement: always offer the share functionality
VariantManagement: enhancing duplicate entry check
VariantManagmnt: save handling after transport dialog was canceled
autobinding triggers search, when filter bar is assigned
disable automatic search on chart&table when autobinding is set

sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SmartLink - semanticAttribute takes over the value of attribute it is bound to (II)

sap.ui.comp.personalization.DimeasureController - change of chart type after 'Cancel' is fixed

sap.ui.comp.smartform.SmartForm - unittest

sap.ui.comp.smarttable.SmartTable - do not call personalization controller after variant is saved
sap.ui.comp.xController: localization
: sap.ui.comp.smartform.GroupElement: Issue during update of label is solved
SmartTable: cleanup SmartFilter events when destroyed
SmartTable: parse initiallyVisibleFields correctly
SmartField: New ObjectStatus property
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartAreaMicroChart: Title, Description and Unit are set
FilterBar: remove contentWidth in Filter-dialog
SmartField: Creation of UOM fields issue solved
SmartField: Formatter for editable, visible and mandatory now can handle destroyed FieldControl
SmartField: Read-only drop down list box refresh issue solved
SmartField: Setter/Getter will now be destroyed on change of context binding
SmartField: enable UTC DateTime conversion on ValueHelps
SmartForm: Colon is now added after label for horizontal layout
SmartLabel: corrections for label obtainment
SmartTable: display numeric and date fields right-aligned in LTR
SmartVariant: correction for storing the app standard variant
sap.ui.comp.SmartBullectMicroChart: flickering unit of measure label has been corrected
sap.ui.comp.SmartMicroChart: Property support "enableAutoBinding" fixed
sap.ui.comp.SmartMicroChart: fix type handling to improve ODataModel compatibility
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SmartLink - determines navigation targets
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SmartLink - mainNavigationId is not overwritten after calling of show()
sap.ui.comp.navpopover.SmartLink - mainNavigationId is not overwritten after calling of show() + examples
SmartChart: New property for visibility of Variant Management
SmartChart: New property showChartTooltip
SmartChart: Check for inner chart instance in setShowChartTooltip
SmartChart: Display measure unit for details list item
SmartChart: Remove content from drill-in page before setting drill-in list.
SmartControls: retrieve data  in F4 after SmartFilter initialises
SmartFilter: use dummy text while validating from OData Date type
SmartFilterBar: provide stable id for smart variant management
SmartForm: Fields are now alligned correctly for horizontal layout
SmartTable: force state updates based on ListBinding change reason
SmartVariantManagement: correction for setCurrentVariantId

sap.ui.comp.personalization.Controller - AlreadyKnown snapshot has to store date in internal format
sap.ui.comp.smartmicrochart.SmartAreaMicroChart: ChartBindingPath corrected

Fix label issue in combining a combined field with another field

SmartField: Factory destroy issue solved
